page.title: 03COMMUNITY POLICEMAN,UNSTONE.
page.content: {P.C. Insley}lives in Unstone & has been Community Policeman for two years. "I work in the Unstone area & Apperknowle & Handley, mainly using a push-bike.Some years ago the authorities decided a bobby on a bike was old-fashioned. They put all the policemen in cars. We'd hardly any time to talk to anyone. So we've gone back to the old system. "My job is mainly to show my presence.People come up & talk to me. I get complaints from older people about children being pests, running through gardens etc. Then I make sure I'm at that place at the relevent time. I do a 40 hr. week. Every month I go to Council meetings, & they say there are fewer complaints. It seems to be working. I think we'll be doing it for some time."
